resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/106369</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>106369</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206024</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Stories from Space</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geschichten vom Platz</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Histoires de l'espace</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Histórias do espaço</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Storia da spazio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ιστορίες από το διάστημα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Historias del espacio</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">tells brief stories about the planets, tools used for exploring space, and what's in space. Photos of planets, stars, telescopes, and space craft are included.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">erklärt kurze Geschichten über die Planeten, die
Hilfsmittel, die für das Erforschen des Platzes benutzt werden, und 
was im Platz ist. Fotos der Planeten, der Sterne, der Teleskope 
und der Platzfertigkeit sind enthalten.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">dit de brèves histoires au sujet des planètes, 
outils utilisés pour explorer l'espace, et ce qui est dans l'espace. 
Les photos des planètes, tient le premier rôle, des télescopes, et 
le métier de l'espace sont inclus.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">diz histórias breves sobre os planetas, 
ferramentas usadas explorando o espaço, e o que está no espaço. 
As fotos dos planetas, das estrelas, dos telescópios, e do 
ofício do espaço são incluídas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">dice alle brevi storia circa i pianeti, strumenti 
utilizzati per l'esplorazione dello spazio e che cosa è nello spazio.
Le foto dei pianeti, delle stelle, dei telescopi e del mestiere 
dello spazio sono incluse.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">λέει τις συνοπτικές ιστορίες για τους πλανήτες, 
εργαλεία που χρησιμοποιούνται για να ερευνήσει το διάστημα, και τι
στο διάστημα. Οι φωτογραφίες των πλανητών, των αστεριών, των
τηλεσκοπίων, και της διαστημικής τέχνης συμπεριλαμβάνονται.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">cuenta las historias abreviadas sobre los 
planetas, herramientas usadas para explorar el espacio, y cuál está 
en espacio. Las fotos de planetas, de estrellas, de telescopios,
y del arte del espacio son incluidas.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206024</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>106369</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/stories-from-space</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
